languages.text: "Ваша предшественница всегда отдавала должное содержанию реликвария и его нуждам, и при ней вера на корабле занимала надлежащее место". {n}Адальберт дипломатично улыбается вам.{/n}

"Your predecessor always had due concern for the reliquary's maintenance and its needs, and under her rule, faith occupied its proper place on this ship." {n}Adalbert gives you a diplomatic smile.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ваша предшественница всегда отдавала должное содержанию реликвария и его нуждам, и при ней вера на корабле занимала надлежащее место". {n}Адальберт дипломатично улыбается вам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Your predecessor always had due concern for the reliquary's maintenance and its needs, and under her rule, faith was given its proper place on this ship." {n}Adalbert smiles a diplomatic smile at you.{/n}

"Your predecessor always had due concern for the reliquary's maintenance and its needs, and under her rule, faith was given its proper place on this ship." {n}Adalbert smiles a diplomatic smile at you.{/n}

"Your predecessor always had due concern for the reliquary's maintenance and its needs, and under her rule, faith occupied its proper place on this ship." {n}Adalbert gives you a diplomatic smile.{/n}

languages.text: « Votre prédécesseure se préoccupait comme il se doit de l'entretien et des besoins du reliquaire. Sous sa houlette, la foi occupait une place adéquate à bord de ce vaisseau, » {n}déclare Adalbert avec un sourire diplomatique.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your predecessor always had due concern for the reliquary's maintenance and its needs, and under her rule, faith occupied its proper place on this ship." {n}Adalbert gives you a diplomatic smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Votre prédécesseure se préoccupait comme il se doit de l'entretien et des besoins du reliquaire. Sous sa houlette, la foi occupait une place adéquate à bord de ce vaisseau, » {n}déclare Adalbert avec un sourire diplomatique.{/n}

languages.text: «Su predecesora siempre se preocupó debidamente por el mantenimiento del relicario y todas sus necesidades, y bajo su mandato la fe ocupaba el lugar que le corresponde en esta nave». {n}Adalbert te dedica una sonrisa diplomática.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your predecessor always had due concern for the reliquary's maintenance and its needs, and under her rule, faith occupied its proper place on this ship." {n}Adalbert gives you a diplomatic smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Su predecesora siempre se preocupó debidamente por el mantenimiento del relicario y todas sus necesidades, y bajo su mandato la fe ocupaba el lugar que le corresponde en esta nave». {n}Adalbert te dedica una sonrisa diplomática.{/n}

languages.text: “您的前任行商浪人一直非常关心圣骨匣的维护工作与相关需求。在她的统治期间，帝皇的信仰在这艘船上得到了应有的地位。”{n}阿达伯特对你露出了外交官式的微笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your predecessor always had due concern for the reliquary's maintenance and its needs, and under her rule, faith occupied its proper place on this ship." {n}Adalbert gives you a diplomatic smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “您的前任行商浪人一直非常关心圣骨匣的维护工作与相关需求。在她的统治期间，帝皇的信仰在这艘船上得到了应有的地位。”{n}阿达伯特对你露出了外交官式的微笑。{/n}

languages.text: 「あなたの前任者は、聖遺物箱の維持とその必要性に常に配慮していました。彼女の統治下で、信仰はこの船にふさわしい場所を与えられました」{n}アダルバートは、さっぱりとした笑みを浮かべた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your predecessor always had due concern for the reliquary's maintenance and its needs, and under her rule, faith occupied its proper place on this ship." {n}Adalbert gives you a diplomatic smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの前任者は、聖遺物箱の維持とその必要性に常に配慮していました。彼女の統治下で、信仰はこの船にふさわしい場所を与えられました」{n}アダルバートは、さっぱりとした笑みを浮かべた。{/n}

languages.text: "Eure Vorgängerin hat sich immer angemessen um die Wartung und Bedürfnisse des Reliquiars gekümmert, und unter ihrer Herrschaft hatte der Glaube auf diesem Schiff den Platz, der ihm gebührt." {n}Adalbert lächelt dich diplomatisch an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your predecessor always had due concern for the reliquary's maintenance and its needs, and under her rule, faith occupied its proper place on this ship." {n}Adalbert gives you a diplomatic smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eure Vorgängerin hat sich immer angemessen um die Wartung und Bedürfnisse des Reliquiars gekümmert, und unter ihrer Herrschaft hatte der Glaube auf diesem Schiff den Platz, der ihm gebührt." {n}Adalbert lächelt dich diplomatisch an.{/n}

languages.text: "Selefiniz kutsal emanet odasının bakımı ve ihtiyaçları ile her daim ilgilenmiştir ve inanç, onun hükümdarlığı altında bu gemideki gerekli yerini almıştır." {n}Adalbert sana diplomatik bir tavırla gülümsüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your predecessor always had due concern for the reliquary's maintenance and its needs, and under her rule, faith occupied its proper place on this ship." {n}Adalbert gives you a diplomatic smile.{/n}
